name: Scout Client Dashboard (SCD)
description: A robust platform that captures and analyzes user interactions to optimize enterprise operations. It drives growth by providing actionable insights and reducing costs through efficient data utilization.

name: Soroco Neo Design System (SNDS)
description: A comprehensive suite of reusable components that standardizes the user interface across products. It enhances user experience consistency and streamlines the development process by reducing redundancy.

name: ESLint
description: A centralized library designed to enforce consistent code quality across multiple projects. It minimizes integration issues and promotes best practices, ensuring smooth and efficient development cycles.

name: Scout Turbo
description: A versatile low-code platform that simplifies the creation of complex applications. It enables users with minimal coding experience to design and customize robust interfaces, accelerating the software development process.
